page.home.head.title: Amer Albadawi
page.home.title: Senior Software Engineer with a Passion for Creativity.
page.home.description-3: I am dedicated to creating a substantial global impact through the design and implementation of highly streamlined and efficient systems.
page.about.title: Empowering Companies Worldwide.
page.about.paragraph: I am a Senior Software Engineer based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, with 8 years of experience in software development, specializing in front-end technologies. I possess deep expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, and frameworks such as Angular and ReactJS. My skill set includes proficiency in libraries like Bootstrap 5, Angular Materials, and Tailwind, which I use to create responsive and user-friendly interfaces. With a strong focus on delivering high-quality software solutions, I am passionate about leveraging my technical knowledge to drive innovation and improve user experiences
page.Portfolio.title: As a pivotal contributor to numerous significant projects

page.contact.subject-placeholder: Let me know how we can i help you
